name: Funds spent for business R&D performed in the United States, by source of funds, selected industry, and company size: 2021
description: Funds spent for business R&D performed in the United States, by source of funds, selected industry, and company size: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_industry_naics_code_and_company_size_b
variableMeasured.description: Industry, NAICS code, and company size hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_companies_domestic
variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others Companies Domestic

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_companies_foreignc
variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others Companies Foreignc

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_all_other_organizationsd
variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others All Other Organizationsd

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification was based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2021.
